iPhone 6

screen.width        375
screen.height       667
devicePixelRatio    2


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=375,
        view=full

innerWidth          375
innerHeight         559


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=375,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          375
innerHeight         628


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=1500,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          1500
innerHeight         2510


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=667,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          667
innerHeight         375


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=2668,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          2668
innerHeight         1500
